fields.summary: Kroll Callback on timer thread fails

fields.description:
h4.Problem
A module is using the native CADisplayLink timer and have the timer callback invoke a KrollCallback.

The fireCallback it's being used with a property bound to the KrollCallback object.

This causes a program crash with a SIGBUS error on the calling thread

h5.Module
Testing code attached:  try "titanium run" (badanimation.zip)

h5.Repro sequence
If the module is attached to a Titanium project throw this to an app.js and embed module to Tiapp.xml file
{code:title=app.js}
// open a single window
var window = Ti.UI.createWindow({
	backgroundColor:'white'
});
var label = Ti.UI.createLabel();
window.add(label);
window.open();

// TODO: write your module tests here
var badanimation = require('com.badanimation');
Ti.API.info("module is => " + badanimation);

var animator = badanimation.createAnimator({
    callback: function(e){Ti.API.info("time is "+e.timestamp);}
});

Ti.API.info("animator is => " + animator);

animator.startAnimation();
{code}

h5.Tiapp.xml
{noformat}
    <modules>
    	<module verison="0.1" platform="iphone">com.badanimation</module>
    </modules>
{noformat}
